title: Understanding Digital Certificates
text: A digital certificate is a crucial component in ensuring secure communication over the internet. It acts as a digital passport that verifies the identity of the entities involved in the communication.

title: Components of a Digital Certificate
text: Digital certificates typically contain information such as the certificate holder's name, a serial number, expiration dates, a copy of the certificate holder's public key, and the digital signature of the certificate-issuing authority.

hintAnswer: an attachment to a file or email message that vouches for its authenticity, provides secure encryption, or supplies a verifiable signature
title: Purpose of a Digital Certificate
text: What is the primary purpose of a digital certificate?
choices: an attachment to a file or email message that vouches for its authenticity, provides secure encryption, or supplies a verifiable signature
>a document that provides a detailed description of a software application
>a file that contains a list of all the websites visited by a user
>a certificate that guarantees the quality of a product
